nodes.name: Sam Altman
nodes.Notes: CEO of OpenAI and former Y Combinator president

nodes.name: St. Louis
nodes.Notes: Sam Altman's hometown

nodes.name: Stanford
nodes.Notes: University Sam Altman attended before founding Loopt

nodes.name: Loopt
nodes.Notes: Altman's first startup (location-based social app)

nodes.name: Y Combinator (YC)
nodes.Notes: Seed accelerator that funded Loopt and later hired Altman as president

nodes.name: Paul Graham (PG)
nodes.Notes: YC co-founder who mentored Sam Altman

nodes.name: Jessica Livingston
nodes.Notes: YC co-founder who also mentored Sam Altman

nodes.name: Elon Musk
nodes.Notes: Tech entrepreneur, co-founder of OpenAI

nodes.name: Rosewood Hotel
nodes.Notes: Location of pivotal 2015 dinner on AI leading to OpenAI's founding

nodes.name: OpenAI
nodes.Notes: Founded in 2015 with a mission to build beneficial AGI

nodes.name: DeepMind
nodes.Notes: London-based AI lab owned by Google

nodes.name: Microsoft
nodes.Notes: Partnered with OpenAI in 2019, investing $1 billion

nodes.name: Kevin Scott
nodes.Notes: CTO of Microsoft, co-interviewed with Altman in 2023

nodes.name: Reinforcement Learning (RL)
nodes.Notes: Machine learning technique used to teach AI through rewards

nodes.name: AGI (Artificial General Intelligence)
nodes.Notes: Human-level AI or broad, general intelligence

nodes.name: GPT-2
nodes.Notes: OpenAI's early large language model, partially withheld from open release

nodes.name: GPT-3
nodes.Notes: OpenAI's 3rd-generation language model (launched 2020)

nodes.name: GPT-3.5
nodes.Notes: Improved GPT-3 variant fine-tuned for chat use cases

nodes.name: GPT-4
nodes.Notes: More advanced OpenAI model released in 2023

nodes.name: ChatGPT
nodes.Notes: OpenAI's conversational AI chatbot launched Nov 2022

nodes.name: Playground
nodes.Notes: OpenAI's web interface for developers to interact with GPT models

nodes.name: RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback)
nodes.Notes: Method to fine-tune models with human preference data

nodes.name: Turing test
nodes.Notes: Examines AI's ability to appear indistinguishable from a human

nodes.name: Anthropic
nodes.Notes: AI startup founded by ex-OpenAI employees

nodes.name: DALL-E
nodes.Notes: OpenAI's image generation model

nodes.name: Jasper AI
nodes.Notes: Used GPT-3 for marketing copywriting services

nodes.name: DeepSeek
nodes.Notes: Chinese open-model competitor that released MIT-licensed AI

nodes.name: LLaMA
nodes.Notes: Meta's open-source large language model

nodes.name: Helion
nodes.Notes: Nuclear fusion startup funded by YC

nodes.name: New Bing
nodes.Notes: Microsoft's GPT-4-powered search chatbot launched Feb 2023

nodes.name: xAI
nodes.Notes: Elon Musk's AI venture

nodes.name: IBM
nodes.Notes: Tech firm involved in AI regulation discussions

nodes.name: Dwarkesh Patel
nodes.Notes: Podcaster who noted AI has yet to produce major new scientific laws

nodes.name: David Deutsch
nodes.Notes: Physicist, author of 'The Beginning of Infinity'

nodes.name: The Beginning of Infinity
nodes.Notes: Book by David Deutsch discussing knowledge and creativity
